descriptionHtml:
[center]
[i][b][color=#6aa84f][size=6]GRASS FIELD[/size][/color][/b][/i][/center]
[center][color=green][size=3][b]I hope you like it![/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center]This MOD changes the grasses of the south Skyrim.
This mod is not performance frendly, you need high spec machine.[/center]

[center]I was influenced by Dat Grass (Now hidden but you can download from Steam Work Shop).
Thanks for (JZE) Nicknp16
I don't use his file(esp and textures).
This is one's own work.

Do not upload to Steam Workshop.[/center]

[center][i][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]- Install -[/size][/color][/b][/i]
I recommend to use NMM or other install software.[/center]
[center][size=2]Please Edit Skyrim.ini.
[Grass]
bAllowCreateGrass=1
bAllowLoadGrass=0
iMinGrassSize= ... you can adjust grass density (20 ... for high spec users , 40-60 for middle spec users)[/size][/center]

[center][color=#ff7700][size=4][i][b]- Credit -[/b][/i][/size][/color]
tamu75
mindflux for grass meshes and textures.[/center]

[center][color=#ff7700][size=4][i][b]- Log -[/b][/i][/size][/color]
v1.0 Beta released.
v1.1 Fixed HearthFire Bug. Added Dark color version.
v1.2 Added LOD textures pack, but it's not perfect.
v2.0 Added Some version. Added LOD textures. Compatible with SFO Completely.[/center]
author: tamu75
